sentence: Disney has been an outspoken critic of the measure, going so far as to say its goal as a company? is having the bill repealed by the legislature or struck down in the courts.? In return, Florida stripped Disney of its independent special district? status, with Governor Ron DeSantis warning that if the company chose to use its economic might to attack the parents of my state,? he would treat it as a provocation? and fight back.?
